title: Find Control Character in String
description:
FIND_CTRL searches the string str starting at position POS and returns the
position at which the next control character is. Control characters are all
characters whose value is less than 32 or 127.
name: FIND_CTRL

input.name: str
input.description: The string in which to search for control characters.

input.name: pos
input.description: The position in the string from which to start the search.

return_value.description: The position of the first control character found in the string. Returns 0 if no control character is found.
